checkUser: select count(*) as count,type,registerName from bim_app_user where registerName='{0}' and password='{1}'
appTypeRoot_Update: update bim_apptype_info set code='{0}',name='{1}' where id='{2}'
appTypeInfo_Update: update bim_apptype_info set name='{0}',code='{1}',remark='{3}' where id='{4}'
bimApp_Delete: update bim_app set available='0' where id='{0}'
develop_applist_select: select a.appname,a.appEnName,a.app_price,a.app_size,a.app_publishdate,a.support_version,a.icon_addr,a.app_status,b.name as appTypeName,c.hostAppName from bim_app as a right join  bim_apptype_info  b on a.apptype_id=b.id right join bim_app_host c on a.hostapp_id=c.id where a.app_status='{0}'
query_dev_applist_select: select a.appname,a.appEnName,a.app_price,a.app_size,a.app_publishdate,a.support_version,a.icon_addr,a.app_status,b.name as appTypeName,c.hostAppName from bim_app as a right join  bim_apptype_info  b on a.apptype_id=b.id right join bim_app_host c on a.hostapp_id=c.id where a.appname like '%{0}%'
bimUser_Select: select * from bim_app_user where type='{0}' and state='{1}'
list_app_Select: select a.uid,a.appname,a.appEnName,a.app_price,a.app_size,a.app_publishdate,a.support_version,a.icon_addr,a.app_status,b.name as appTypeName,c.hostAppName,d.name from bim_app as a left join  bim_apptype_info  b on a.apptype_id=b.id left join bim_app_host c on a.hostapp_id=c.id left join bim_app_user d on d.user_id=a.developer_id  where a.app_status='{0}'
list_choose_Select: select * from bim_list as a,bim_app as b where a.uid=b.uid and a.type='{0}'
